titles: A letter sent to the Right Honourable the Lord Digby, from Sir Barnabas Scudamore Governor of Hereford, concerning the late siedge of the citty of Hereford.
author: Scudamore, Barnabas, Sir, d. 1658.

notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
